Whenever this creature transforms into Devdan, Lucky Halberdier, tap each creature target opponent controls.
Ward–Tap three untapped creatures you control.
[i]Serenity+[/i] – At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add one mana of any color for each creature you control.
[i]Rushdown[/i] – {T}: Tap target creature.
